attributes.action: Headlight Glare Is Getting Dangerous — We Need Change!
attributes.additional_details: Reconsider these LED LIGHTS because they’re so bright that they leave dots in front of my eyes and many others eyes and even if it’s for a second that one second could cause a RTC and then who would be at fault? Those ones with the bright LED lights shining through your eyes and whole car or the person who’s driving and has the lights shining at them causing them to have dots in their eyes. Please reconsider this it causes my anxiety to go through the roof.
attributes.background: I want to raise a growing safety concern regarding the increasing use of extremely bright LED headlights on vehicles. Over recent years, these lights have become noticeably more intense, and many drivers, myself included are experiencing significant difficulty and discomfort because of them.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban LED vehicle headlights or regulate bulb wattage
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/744882
